physical_appearance:This is a gelatin silver print and the image captured shows a man standing atop a concrete beam with a long tube in his right hand.  To the bottom right of the print
 two individuals with their heads wrapped in cloth are seen to be cleaning. To the left of the print there is a large sun hat and several wooden planks. On the verso
 there is a photographer\u0027s chop with the number and title of work.

sgcool_label_text:Ho Koon Sang was a member of the Photographic Society of Singapore and an Associate of the Royal Photographic Society in London.  These photos are typical of the salon photography style of the time
 with an emphasis on technique
 composition and tone.
